mapper.update:
update user
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},

u_ticket = #{uTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ar_id = #{arId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SVIPTime = #{sviptime,jdbcType=DATE}, wbtype = #{wbtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_type = #{uType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_ticket = #{uTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ar_id = #{arId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
